name: Crystal Quest Classic
description: Crystal Quest is a fast moving, adrenaline-boiling video arcade game from 1987 that won many awards. Now on the latest hardware.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel core i3 processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: All cards since 2004 should work DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
